name: Custom Pet Portrait, Small size
description: Get your own completely custom painting of your furry, fuzzy, feathered, or scaley friend! This listing is for any size portrait painted on canvas from 8X10” up to 12X16”. When emailing me your pet pics, please include info on your pets personality or quirks. Any colors or description of your home decor can be incorporated into the painting. Tell me any ideas you have! Please see FAQ for info on the ordering process!

name: Custom Pet Portrait, Medium size
description: Beautiful, unique, modern style painting of your special animal pal! This listing is for a portrait painted on a medium sized canvas, 14X18” or 16X20”. Please include special info about your pet, such as traits or quirks. Also include any colors or patterns you would like to see in the finished painting. I can incorporate almost anything requested! Please see FAQ for info on the ordering process!

name: Custom Pet Portrait, Large size
description: Your one of a kind pet in a one of a kind painting! This listing is for a large size pet portrait, 18X24”, 20X24”, or 22X28”. When emailing me the pics of your pet, please tell me a bit about your them. Also let me know if there is anything I can incorporate, such as a color scheme to match you decor, to help customize your painting further! Please see FAQ for info on the ordering process!

name: Digital Vector Art Portrait
description: High Quality Digital Vector Art of your bestest friend This listing is for a digital vector image of your buddy done in Adobe Illustrator. I use a Wacom Tablet, which is like a paint brush plugged into my PC which allows me to have great control and get very detailed results. I will take the finished piece and have it printed any size on high quality printer and paper. It will be shipped to you ready to be framed. As will my traditional paintings, let me know of anything special, such as your pets personality and a color scheme you would like me to use. Please see the FAQ for further info.
